channel.title: New append method
channel.description: How would i make the append method make a line at the top instead of all the way at the bottom? Like appendtobanned adds the username at the bottom of the list, how do you make it go at the top?

item.title: New append method
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Append is used to add something to a file, and usually, when you add something, it goes at the end of the file. If you want to change this, you can override the writing method to put it at the beginning of the file.

Read full topic

item.title: New append method
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Hmm… I don’t think there’s a way too, other then writings yours, and then rewriting the file. Perhaps something like the following.

else if(command.startsWith("ban") && playerRights > 2) { File write = new File("./data/bannedusers.txt"); String[] contents; if(write.exists()) { try { BufferedWriter out; BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(write)); String inFile; int i = 0; while((inFile = in.readLine()) != null) { contents[i] = inFile; i++; } out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(write)); out.close(); out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(write, true)); out.write(command.substring(4)); for(String i : contents) { out.write(i); } out.flush(); } catch(IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } else { this.sendMessage("Error."); } }
This way is pretty fail. But, it’s the only way I can think of.

Read full topic
